payor.title: Payor
payor.description:
Complete billing solution adapted to the Senegalese context, developed with Laravel 12 and Livewire. Free and open source.
- Full client management with NINEA support
- Quotes with automatic numbering (DEV-2025-001)
- Invoices with status tracking (draft, sent, paid, overdue)
- 18% VAT (Senegal standard)
- Mobile Money payment support
- Automatic reminders (before, on, and after due date)
- Customizable email templates
- XOF currency (Franc CFA)
- Senegalese phone format (+221)
- CSV export

paxton-securite.title: Paxton Sécurité
paxton-securite.description:
Complete security solutions for businesses, industries and individuals in Senegal.
- Fire protection (Smoke extraction, Extinguishers)
- Video surveillance
- Access control & Biometrics
- Intrusion alarm
- Fire doors & Automation
- Corporate showcase with smooth animations
- Product catalog with filtering
- Custom quote request system
- Blog & News
- Email signature generator

kamit-solutions.title: Kamit Solutions
kamit-solutions.description:
Modular SaaS platform for business management in Senegal and West Africa.
- KamitFleet: Fleet management and GPS tracking (web & mobile app)
- KamitField: Field team management (web & mobile app)
- KamitImmo: Real estate management
- KamitSales: Sales management and CRM

kamit-fleet.title: KamitFleet
kamit-fleet.description:
Fleet management and GPS tracking SaaS platform for businesses in Senegal and West Africa.
- Real-time vehicle tracking
- Route optimization
- Fuel consumption monitoring
- Driver management
- Maintenance scheduling
- Detailed reports and analytics
- Multi-company support

kamit-fleet-mobile.title: KamitFleet Mobile
kamit-fleet-mobile.description:
Native mobile application for real-time fleet tracking.
- Real-time vehicle location
- Push notifications for alerts
- Offline mode with synchronization
- Driver trip logs
- Available on iOS and Android

kamit-field.title: KamitField
kamit-field.description:
Field team management SaaS platform for businesses with on-the-ground operations.
- Task assignment and tracking
- Agent geolocation
- Attendance management
- Performance monitoring
- Route planning
- Real-time communication

kamit-field-mobile.title: KamitField Mobile
kamit-field-mobile.description:
Native mobile application for field teams.
- Task management on the go
- GPS check-in/check-out
- Photo uploads for reports
- Offline mode with synchronization
- Push notifications for new assignments
- Available on iOS and Android

kamit-immo.title: KamitImmo
kamit-immo.description:
Real estate management SaaS platform for property owners and agencies.
- Property portfolio management
- Tenant management
- Rent collection and tracking
- Lease contract management
- Maintenance requests
- Financial reports

kamit-sales.title: KamitSales
kamit-sales.description:
Sales management and CRM SaaS platform for businesses.
- Customer relationship management
- Sales pipeline tracking
- Quote and invoice generation
- Product catalog management
- Sales team performance
- Revenue analytics

kamit-core.title: KamitCore
kamit-core.description:

- Project management
- Time tracking

- HRIS features

prosen-facturation.title: ProSen Facturation
prosen-facturation.description:
Modern and complete invoicing and CRM web application built on Laravel 12 with Livewire, Volt and Flux UI.
- Invoice management
- Client management
- Quote generation
- Payment tracking
- Reporting and analytics

s2ec-website.title: S2EC Website
s2ec-website.description:
Professional website for S2EC (Société d'Entrepreneuriat d'Études et de Construction), a construction company based in Dakar, Senegal.
- Homepage with hero, services, achievements and blog
- About page
- Detailed services page
- Achievement gallery with category filters
- Blog with search and pagination
- Contact form with validation
- Admin backoffice with dashboard

infos-ai.title: Infos AI
infos-ai.description:
Automated news aggregator powered by AI. Laravel 12 application that automatically fetches articles from RSS feeds, reformulates them via AI, and publishes them on a news site.
- Automatic article retrieval from RSS feeds (France 24, RFI, Zone Afrique)
- Content reformulation via Google Gemini API
- Admin interface for article moderation
- Automatic task scheduling every hour

ohkas.title: OHKAS
ohkas.description:

- Wave payment integration
